FROM GALLERY g JOIN MEMBER m ON g.MEMBER_CODE = m.MEMBER_CODE LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TEAM tm ON g.TEAM_CODE = tm.TEAM_CODE AND g.MEMBER_CODE = tm.MEMBER_CODE
WHERE g.TEAM_CODE = #{team_code} ORDER BY g.GALLERY_CODE DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
